sentences.sContent: All you have to do is flip the toaster upside down, and the toast slides right out onto your plate, ready for the application of butter and marmalade.
sentences.sContent_eng: All you have to do is flip the toaster upside down, and the toast slides right out onto your plate, ready for the application of butter and marmalade.
sentences.sCn: 你所要做的就是把它翻下来，面包就会自动滑落到你的盘子上，等待你给它们抹上黄油和果酱了。

sentences.sContent: At Fortnum's you'll find the finest caviar, cheeses, fresh fruit, veg, fish, poultry and meats, as well as a huge range of teas and, of course, marmalade!
sentences.sContent_eng: At Fortnum's you'll find the finest caviar, cheeses, fresh fruit, veg, fish, poultry and meats, as well as a huge range of teas and, of course, marmalade!
sentences.sCn: 在这儿，有上好的鱼子酱、奶酪、新鲜水果、蔬菜、鱼、家禽、肉类以及大量茶叶，当然还有不能忘的——果酱！

phrases.pCn: 桔子酱；苦橙；橙皮马末兰果酱

trans.tranCn: 橘子或柠檬等水果制成的果酱
trans.tranOther: a  jam  made from fruit such as oranges,  lemon s  ,or  grapefruit  , usually eaten at breakfast
